It would also alleviate the suffering of patients and their families, who often have to witness their loved ones endure immense pain and suffering. Moreover, legalizing euthanasia would ensure that the process is regulated and safeguards are in place to prevent abuse. It is essential to respect the autonomy and dignity of individuals, and legalizing euthanasia is a step towards achieving that.
